name: Ultimate Big Truck Car Transport Trailer Simulator
name_original: Ultimate Big Truck Car Transport Trailer Simulator
description:
Drive a gigantic truck and transport important cargo across the city. Carry expensive luxury cars and construction vehicles like bulldozers and transfer them from one part of the city to another. Drive carefully in the city as there is heavy traffic. Deliver the cargo safely in time to complete the mission. Carry wild african animals in a cage and transport them to the city zoo. This driving simulator is one of the best transport games of 2016.

Download now to experience the thrill of becoming a truck driver and transport cars and other cargo in the city.

Please give us your feedback in the reviews section so we can improve your gaming experience.
